preface.title: Preface
preface.para: When finished, this book should represent the complete and authoritative documentation for JessyInk. At the moment, it is still in its early stages. However, as time progresses I hope it will be expanded to include a detailed description of the architecture of JessyInk and all its features. Should you need any assistance in using JessyInk or have any suggestions for new features, feel free to use the facilities provided on the launchpad development site at https://launchpad.net/jessyink or contact me directly via email at hannes@hochreiner.net.
